channel.title: MySQL on Travis Green
channel.description: Recent content in MySQL on Travis Green

item.title: SQL: Writing scripts to analyze drug use statistics
item.description: With SQL queries, we’re able to answer questions like: Do graduate degree holders use caffeine more often than less educated people? Which illegal drugs are becoming more popular over the decades? Are less educated people more likely to lie about (overreport) drug usage? Do senior citizens smoke & drink less than young adults?
